hero.title: ALIAS AUTO KOREA International Car Export
hero.subtitle: Full cycle services from inspection to delivery across CIS and Asia

about.title: About ALIAS AUTO KOREA
about.description: ALIAS AUTO KOREA is an international operator in car export and logistics, uniting teams in South Korea, Russia, and Kazakhstan. We provide a full cycle of services — from car inspection and documentation to delivery and customs clearance.

feature1.title: Premium Vehicles
feature1.description: Exclusively luxury and premium car models

feature2.title: Secure Transport
feature2.description: Fully insured and secure delivery process

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Complete car export solutions from Korea to CIS countries
services.inspectionDesc: Thorough pre-export inspection and quality verification
services.documentationDesc: Complete handling of all export documentation and legal requirements
services.logisticsDesc: Secure transportation and delivery coordination to destination
services.supportDesc: Dedicated support at every stage of the export process

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Say
testimonials.description: Trusted by car dealers and exporters across the region

testimonial1.quote: ALIAS AUTO KOREA made our car export process seamless and transparent. Their team's expertise in Korean and CIS markets is unmatched.
testimonial1.name: Alexei Petrov

testimonial2.quote: Professional service from start to finish. They handled all documentation and logistics perfectly. Highly recommended!
testimonial2.name: Dmitri Kozlov

testimonial3.quote: Outstanding support throughout the entire export process. Their CRM system keeps us informed at every step.
testimonial3.name: Sergei Volkov

testimonial4.quote: The team's knowledge of Korean car markets and CIS regulations is impressive. Trustworthy and efficient service.
testimonial4.name: Nursultan Aitbayev

testimonial5.quote: Excellent communication and delivery. They made exporting cars from Korea to Russia much easier than expected.
testimonial5.name: Vladimir Sokolov
